text.txt2: We are so happy to meet you.
text.txt3: We have defined an introductory discount for you.
text.thanksMessage:
We would be happy to be a solution partner to provide a perfect Food and beverage experience and accompany you in your enjoyable moments. Your welcome discount has been activated! Visit your nearest Bonna dealer to take advantage of this special offer right away.
For details on the closest dealer, feel free to contact us at info@bonna.com.tr or reach out via our Instagram account @bonna.tr!
